name: The Blood
description: The Blood is a Hawaiian landrace phenotype that appears so rarely that it has gained a mythological status among growers. The Blood was given its name for the red veins found in its stems and leaves, and the deep red sap that flows from them. The Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank’s Kona Gold “Blood” phenotype and other “Blood” phenotypes are believed to be a sign from Ke Akua (God), blessing the grower and signaling an abundant harvest.
descriptionPlain: The Blood is a Hawaiian landrace phenotype that appears so rarely that it has gained a mythological status among growers. The Blood was given its name for the red veins found in its stems and leaves, and the deep red sap that flows from them. The Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank’s Kona Gold “Blood” phenotype and other “Blood” phenotypes are believed to be a sign from Ke Akua (God), blessing the grower and signaling an abundant harvest.

highlightedReviews.text:
Mahalo nui Loa @Leafly for the wonderful reviews!

The Blood is a very special lady here in Hawai'i and she can now be found on the mainland as well!!

For any Leafly members looking to sample da supa 'ono Kona Gold Hawaiian bloodline cut Pua Mana 'Ohana hooked The Green Element (home of Monster OG) in Los Angeles up with a sweet cut, Kind Peoples collective in Santa Cruz has the Hawaiian bloodline phenotype in their epic genetics library now, also available for our California 'Ohana @ The Beverly Hills Cannabis Club where each oz is wrapped in gold paper.

For our Oregonian 'Ohana who love Hawaiian strains our best cut of Kona Gold Hawaiian bloodline pheno can be obtained from the master growers at our favorite mainland dispensary: 

Amazon Organics

As for our Hawai'i 'Ohana...well you know where to find dakine ;-)

Aloha a Hui hou,
Pua Mana 'Ohana
My favorite sativa!  It is crisp, and uplifting without too much of a dry mouth.  Smells and tastes great!  This is what a sativa should be.
